author: CW
post_text: May 22, 2023 at 5:33 PM#1Hi !I have a working macro to write commands in Cues like " Go Exec Look 1"I would like to have the "*." as standart in front of the command.Here is my Macro "CMD in Cue":Select @SetUserVar $Cue (Choose Cue)SetUserVar $CMD = ("Enter CMD !")Assign $selectedexec  Cue $Cue /cmd = $"CMD"To make it work over all pages i need to insert the *. in front of the command.AddUserVar $CMD wasnt useful - had the *. after the commandI tried to combine two Variables like $CMD = ("Enter CMD !") and $SP = "*." without success.Any hints, suggestions are welcomeThanx for your helpChris
title: CMD in Cue Macro
